title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You may believe you can solve any problem by throwing more money at it now. However, you could be missing a critical piece of information that prevents you from seeing the dilemma in its entirety. For instance, more cash isnt a solution to living beyond your means as is evidenced by rich people overwhelmed with steeper debt. Focus on managing the resources you already possess, starting with your own attitude. Simple pleasures could bring just as much satisfaction as costlier ones without the hefty price tag. Epictetus wrote, Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
